## üìù How to use Emojis

üßæ Make sure you‚Äôre inside the Dot where you want to add an emoji.

üòÄ Click the Emoji icon on the toolbar to open the emoji menu.

üîç Scroll through categories or use the search bar to quickly find the emoji you want.

üòä Click the emoji to place it directly inside your Dot, exactly where your cursor is positioned.

üßæ Drag the emoji to reposition it if you're adding it on top of a dot.

‚ö° Move, change, or delete your emoji if you need to clarify your annotation.

üí° Tips

* Use emojis to react to comments ‚Äî for example: üëç for agreement, ‚ù§Ô∏è for appreciation, üòÇ for something funny.

* Combine emojis with annotations to draw attention to important details.

* Don‚Äôt overuse them ‚Äî choose 1‚Äì2 per dot to keep the message clear.
